newsitem.title: USA: Software Artistry names financial officer.
newsitem.headline: Software Artistry names financial officer.

text.p: Software Artistry Inc said Wednesday it named Thomas Vanneman as vice president and chief financial officer.
Vanneman had been vice president and treasurer for Acordia Inc.
In November, Software Artistry said Stephen Head resigned as its chief financial officer.

"Tom's background in directing bold, results-driven financial programs for publicly held companies is a perfect match for Software Artistry's aggressive future plans," W. Scott Webber, president, said in a statement.

"With our recent creation of two market-driven business units focusing on the Enterprise Support Management and the Customer Information Systems marketplaces, Software Artistry is well-positioned for 1997 and beyond."
